title: Dont have rift rivals gold icon?
body: I purchased all the rift rival icons when they were on sale, but I never received the golden rift rivals icon, Why is this? Is this just a mistake, that I can have the GMs add it to my acct. or is there a reason??

replies.body: Hmmmm every now and then an icon or two get lost in the delivery process. Double check those icons for me and let me know if you still don't have it!
in the notifications? I dont have it there, I do own all 4 or so of the colors.. but no gold
I've had some poros deliver that icon already, and it is showing up in your inventory right now. If you still aren't seeing it, try refreshing your client and look through those Summoner Icons.
Thank you so much I logged on today to see the icon :D I really appreciate the great support <3
I have the same problem, and have double checked. I also restarted my client several times to make sure D: is there any way for me to get my gold Icon?

I hope u guys had at least played one game with any of those icons(maybe the NA one only as that the default one for ur region), bc apparently RIOT was enabling it for those ppl only, as a sign of support for a region and to be active in community events....
i have the same problem i was wondering why my friends got the icon but i didn't and i also got all the other rift rival icons when they were 1ip, do you need to do something else to get it?
